resources.string: Comedy doesn\'t have to be ugly!

The Comedy Club of Jacksonville opened in November 2012. Focused on great service, delicious food, and first rate ADULT comedy WITHOUT much of the vulgarity, we are excited to offer a higher level of entertainment. Our comics appear on David Letterman, Jay Leno, and Comedy Central and provide a night club act without the fatiguing repetition of hardcore language and content. Get a Jerry Seinfeld style of show, not Jerry Springer. We want your genuine belly laugh, not the embarrassing "what did that person just say" shock laughter that is associated with a foul comic.

Not just sometimes, but each week our Friday and Saturday shows will be rated on two levels: CONTENT and LANGUAGE. Language is a "soft R" with no F-bombs, and Content is an "R" with adult humor but no hardcore vulgarity or language.

 We anniversaries, or just a fun night out. And since most of our comics have never performed live in Jacksonville before, we offer a refreshing variety of top national touring comics who will give you lots of belly laughs.

The Comedy Club of Jacksonville seats 300 comfortably. Our tables are bigger (because we serve great food) and tables are spaced with more square footage per person, unlike the cramped seating of most other comedy clubs. No longer do you have to sit on the lap of the person you are seated next to, but stretch out and enjoy top national touring artists at the Comedy Club of Jacksonville.

Check out The Best Seats in the House. For that special occasion or just a fun night out, The Best Seats in the House are actual front bucket seats from a 2007 XJ8 Jaguar automobile. They are functional for a custom seat position plus includes your first beverage.

Buy a ticket and that\'s it; we do have a full kitchen with high quality food and full bar plus we have great prices on our items, but will not force you to buy anything as other clubs do. Our service is fast and convenient and we hope you indulge but feel free to sit back and enjoy the show!

We are also happy that buying your ticket online costs the same as buying a ticket at the door. There is NO service charge for buying online. It is a free service, unlike other clubs who charge a few extra dollars to buy online.

Similar to buying tickets online, reserving seats through our app costs the same as buying a ticket at the door. Additionally, you have access to EXCLUSIVE deals only available to those download the app, as well as regular updates on our weekend shows.

The Comedy Club of Jacksonville is excited to work with The Blood Alliance in Jacksonville. In conjunction with The Blood Alliance, donors from Jacksonville companies who participate in a blood drive and exceed their goal earn a pair of tickets to a great night of comedy. Companies are recognized during the show with a stage shout out and a \"Thank You\" slide on our pre-show projector slide show. It is proven that laughter can extend your life, and by donating blood and sharing a laugh with us you get a double shot of \"Feel Good\".
We are located at:\n11000 Beach Blvd\nJacksonville, FL 32246

To speak with a human being or to leave a message, you may reach us by telephone. Our phone number is (904) 646-4277.

Alternately, you may send an email by completing the fields below.
We\'re always hiring at the Comedy Club of Jacksonville!\n\nTo apply, please email us your resume at info@jacksonvillecomedy.com.

Any time is a great time to get your group, company, or friends together for some laughs. We strive to offer top national touring comics who are not overly offensive or who have embarrassing humor, but who are able to perform comedy that is \"F\" bomb free. Ask about our FREE Sample the Club offer!\n\nIf your party needs to be funny, clean, and delicious, press \'Reserve Seats\' below to begin your reservation, or you may request more information by clicking \'More Info\'.
Earn 5 points per ticket purchase and 2 each week for viewing notifications. To claim points from ticket purchases or to redeem points, present your device to the host when you arrive.
Select any show below to view information about the comedian. Click on the comedian\'s information to reserve seats for any available showtimes.

I\'m sorry something doesn\'t work; I\'m only human after all! To best help me fix any errors you\'re encountering, fill out the fields below. Be as descriptive as possible, and include details such as where the error occurred and what device you\'re using.\n
